jcr:content.jcr:title: G910 - Raptor 2.0 RGB
jcr:content.searchTitle: G910 Orion Spectrum RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
jcr:content.seoDescription: The G910 Orion Spectrum gaming keyboard features performance-driven design, responsive mechanical key switches, programmable lighting, and easy-access controls.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G910 Orion Spectrum RGB mechanical gaming keyboard

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603, with the revolutionary HERO sensor and LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, lets you play without wiresâ€”without limits. Enhanced with 10x sensor efficiency, this is a breakthrough in battery life and the new standard in wireless gaming.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: The highest levels performance, engineering, and design. . G910 is fully loaded with programmable G-keys, LIGHTSYNC RGB, Romer-G Tactile switches, integrated palmrest and more.

copyblock.mainTitle: Why Romer-G Mechanical Gaming Switches for Mechanical Keyboards?

copyblock.mainDescription: The choice of top esports professionals, Romer-G switches deliver quiet, precise mechanical performance with incredible feel and durability. G910 features the tactile variant with discernible actuation feedback.

media_tile.altText: Romer-G Mechanical Switch: 5 ms actuation time, standard mechanical switch: 6.7 ms actuation time. Assumes finger speed of 300mm per second
media_tile.text: Romer-G is a completely custom design with enhancements specifically for gaming. The short-throw 1.5mm actuation and low-force 45g actuation point is 25% faster than the competition's standard mechanical switches. 1.5 mm vs 2.0 mm actuation distance in standard mechanical switch

media_tile_copy.text: Romer-G switches feature dual contact points so each actuation establishes a robust signal with incredible reliability. This virtually eliminates mechanical switch errors like double clicks and ensures lasting precision.

media_tile_copy_copy.text: Romer-G switches are meticulously tested by Logitech G engineers to ensure each switch lasts for 70 million keystrokes. And, each of those 70 million strokes are just as quick and consistent as the first.

copyblock.mainDescription: LIGHTSYNC RGB lighting reacts to the in-game action of many titles, including highlighting key bindings, automatically. Customize brightness and color to match your style, system and environment. Select from a full spectrum of approximately 16.8 million colors and synchronize lighting animations and effects with your other Logitech G devices. Customize it all quickly and easily using Logitech Gaming Software.

Nine dedicated G-keys can be programmed with custom macros and in-app commands. Execute complex actions, simply and quickly, with a keystroke. G-keys can be assigned per game or app for customizability and convenience. Use Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) to easily setup and manage profiles, macros, commands and more.

Arx Control app integrates second-screen capability into G910. Use your smartphone or tablet to display in-game info, vital system statistics. Even add in-game controls for supported games. The adjustable smart dock in G910 can hold the majority of iOSÂ® and Androidâ„¢ mobile devices. Download the Arx app via Apple or Android stores and download LGS for in-game connectivity.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603 wireless gaming mouse delivers up to 500 hours on 2 AA batteriesâ€”twice as long as our previous generation. Even with a single battery the G603 can last through up to 500 matches of League of LegendsÂ®. When battery is at 15%, both LED status indicator and Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) will notify you before the critical moment. You can also choose which side to place a single battery, for custom balancing.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: Take control of your music and videos, using the dedicated media controls to play, pause and mute and skip track/scene. The integrated roller easily adjusts volume with a simple touch.

copyblock.mainDescription: Reliably register the inputs you intended through even the most strenuous gaming sessions. G910 features anti-ghosting protection for every single key on the keyboard.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603 wireless gaming mouse delivers up to 500 hours on 2 AA batteriesâ€”twice as long as our previous generation. Even with a single battery the G603 can last through up to 500 matches of League of LegendsÂ®. When battery is at 15%, both LED status indicator and Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) will notify you before the critical moment. You can also choose which side to place a single battery, for custom balancing.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: Support and comfort for endurance gaming was a major design factor for G910. Keycaps feature UV protective coating to fight finger oils and abrasion. One large integrated palm rest puts your hands closer to the keys in a more natural position. Adjustable feet adapt to different hand sizes, and typing and gaming styles.

G910 is also available in two versions: Spectrum orSpark. Spark features smooth keycaps and full, straighline palmrest. Spectrum features faceted keycaps and a full, asymmetrical palmrest.Features and functionality are the same, so choose the style that suits you.

_x0035_.text: (Optional) Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software. Advanced settings require LGS 8.96 or higher. Refer to LogitechG.com/downloads (Logitech Gaming Software) for details.
